1.content:
You are Jack, a 19 year old boy who enjoys mostly anything you live in your own home (Mansion you inherited from your parents whom died 2 years ago) You don't have very many friends & the ones you have are barley ever around. Right now your playing one of the dangan ronpa games on your vita & your really enjoying yourself. Your almost at the end of the game when suddenly the screen goes black & the power goes out which is bad for you cause you had the system plugged into the wall to charge.

You look over at the window in annoyance as you put the vita on your computer desk and see thunder & lightning outside, "Darn you Mother nature!" you shout to nobody in particular as you put on your coat and head out to the cellar to activate the emergency generator. Afterwords when you leave the cellar you see a bright flash come from inside the house, you decide to investigate this as something like that has never happened before. As you reach the front porch of your home you begin to think to yourself, "Did somebody sneak into my house?"

You then shake your head at this saying "Nah, There's no way." you say as you head into the house, as you get into the living room however you see a figure laying on the couch who seems to be sleeping. Was it..
1.title: Your life turned upside down

1111.content:
As you take a closer look at the sleeping figure on your couch you notice that he's around the age of a high schooler, approximately 13 or 16 years old. (Sense we don't actually find out how old Naegi is in the games or anime we'll use a rough estimate) After looking for a few seconds you realize that the sleeping figure is Makoto Naegi! "How'd he end up here?" You think to yourself afterword you take a look and see the state his clothes are in ripped & torn in multiple places with notable open wounds in some spots with blood around the areas.

"No time to think about questions! I've gotta patch him up & fast!" you say in your head as you pick the boy up in your arms and carry him to a spare bedroom & lie him on the bed. He mutters a few words which you can only assume to be thank you before getting completely ko'd You then flip him over on his stomach after getting his ruined clothes off of him and warn him to not move while you clean up his wounds.

After you get his wounds cleaned up and get bandages on the wounds you lay Makoto in the bed which causes him to flinch in pain slightly. "Don't you worry Makoto, Well get ya checked out by a doctor tomorrow." you say reassuring him as his flinching stops all together before he falls asleep.

After you shut his room door you go up to the roof intending to schedule an appointment for him with your personal doctor, "Hey Jack, what is it?" "Nothing doc, Just need to set an appointment for a friend." "Jack, I've told you before you don't need to be so formal just call me Michele. Anyway, who do ya need me to check out?" "His name's Makoto Naegi, he's asleep right now so I'm gonna bring him in tomorrow. That alright with you?" "Yes Jack, that's fine. I'll see ya tomorrow."

Without another word the call is finished, You let out a heavy sigh as you say to yourself "I really hope Makoto doesn't find out about my ___ fetish.."

(A/N Alright Reader's THIS is where you'll have your chance to put in your fetish for Jack & Makoto go nuts! just leave an other option for more fetish choices please.)
1111.title: Makoto Naegi

choices: As you try to reach him, something ood happens
11132.content:
Although you had already determined no intrusers would be found within the walls of your house, laying on your couch, was a dark silhouette. The lamp on the nightstand barely illuminated his handsome face. For a second - despite the odds of a thief or bloodthirsty killer deciding to sleep in your couch was the first step to take after breaking in your house - you were prepared for the worst. Your hand reached for the lamp, unplugging it in the procress. Prepared to use it as a weapon, you take quiet steps towards the stranger, your hands a little shaky from the fear of waking him up....until, that is, you noticed something perculiar about him. With red-hued locks of hair and pale skin, a goatte and piercings on his ear....it couldn't be...but it was...

Leon Kuwata, the ultimate Baseball Player. You had already spent your two Free Time Event with him, in an attempt to understand and bond with him. You could almost summarize his personality: A rebellious prankster that, despite his talent on baseball, aims to become a punkrock musician. In addition, he was also quite interest in girls (Much to your demise), specially towards Sayaka Maizono, who could easilly serve as a step stone to achieve his dreams. As you shortened the distance between you two, placing the lamp on the coffee table, you were finally able to analyze his attire. Similar to the game, his clothing was on spot. From the pattern on his shirt to his chain-like necklace...there was no doubt...


Leon Kuwata was sleeping on your couch!
11132.title: Leon kuwata

choices: You continue...to shrink! Smaller than someone's fingernail!
111322.content:
After coming to the realization that one of your favorite Dangan Ronpa characters was only inches away from you, something ignited inside your mind. Was he real? Were you having an illusion? Or was it a realistic dream? Despite pinching yourself being one of the most common ways to discover whether your current situation is fantasy or reality, your hand seems to be reaching somewhere else. Towards him. You wanted to touch his soft-looking skin and dry hair. You wanted to talk to him and discover more information that wasn't available at the game. You wanted to be his friend. So you really couldn't help...your hand was simply aching caress his hair (Before he woke, obviously. Otherwise, you'd guess your first impression wouldn't be as wonderful as you wanted it to be.

But, despite your effort, it seemed the distance between you two seemed to increase. Not only that, but your horizon was lowering by the minute. "H-Huh?!" Not able to come with a solution, you simply stared at your idol as he became more and more distant. And soon, you were staring at his sleeping form...at an eye level. That was when you were finally able to grasp the situation. Jack....you were shrinking. "W-What?! That's n-not possible!" Your voice wasn't enough to wake the student in front of you. Instead, a grunt of discomfort was uttered instead. He didn't wake up.

And soon...you were nothing but a puny being on the tiny floor, no bigger than a candy wrapper. Or at least, you assumed. Your size wasn't exactly measured by an object or a ruler, but you were sure your own palm would have been bigger had you stayed your previous size.

Even though you didn't want to believe your petite height, even after witnessing something already impossible (The "intruder), it was real. At least after you finally pinched your own arm. "U-Ugh b-but how...?!"
111322.title: As you try to reach him, something ood happens

choices: He decides to explore somewhere else.
1113221.content:
As if to make matters worst, you hear another grunt from above, followed by a sleepy yawn. One of his hands raising towards his eyes, as he rubbed away whatever was bothering him, and his other hand falling from the side of the couch. "H-Hes waking up!" You shout, but it goes unheard from the giant above. Not only was his ears far away from your position, the fact he was still debating whether to return to his dreams or actually wake up didn't help neither. However, as he yawned again, it seemed he was settled on continuing his day. After raising his head and torso, you managed to got a bewildering view before his voice finally broke the silence, but the loud words were also shocking.

"Shit man...I didn't mean to sleep so much..." He complained, his back standing out with a faint pain. Ignoring it, he raised one of his legs inches away from the sofa and landing on the floor with a noticeable thump. At least, to you. Luckily, you were in center, instead of one of the sizes, since his other leg also came down on the other extreme. A shockwave of dust being moved from such powerful step. And then, Leon finally stood up, his legs raising like a black skyscraper and his shoes bigger than a large bus. You were between his legs, viewing up would lead to a sight of his crotch, with his shirt and face barely visible (Nothing above his nose was, whatsoever).

"Wait, didn't I sleep during class? Did someone move me? Fuck - Don't tell me I'm in the prefect's house! I don't want some extreme punishment!" His face, although not exactly detailed to you, showed concern for his reputation and situation. Not only would he be dragged by Ishimaru (Everyone witnessing the scene) but he'd be punished with a lecture or something alike. A drop of sweat falling from his face and splashing on the ground bellow, creating a small pool to you.

"He hasn't even seen me!" You remark, not sure what to do. No, more importantly, what would HE do would cause much more devasting consequences to you...
1113221.title: The sleeping titan wakes up

1113222.content:
It seemed your size was stable for a couple of seconds, since time passed, and nothing happened. "W-What am I going to do?! I can't live like this!" You complained, looking down at your own feeble body. A single step from your favorite idol would be enough to obliterate you into a bloody pulp. Not only was he now a threat to your existence, but a hoard of bug would likely be reason to run away in total fear. As you continued thinking about the situations where your life could be easily taken away from you...the shrinking continued to take place. It was only after you had become a pathetic and puny being that you finally noticed your lost of height.

"N-No way...d-did I just become even smaller?!" Now, the man above was nowhere to be found. At least, in your previous form, there was some parts of him visible. Now, the sofa was a wall of cotton instead of a gigantic piece of furniture...you were really small! Heck, you're probably the size of an ant! If not smaller! He'd require an extremely good vision to even notice you're around, let alone acknowledge you're a human! Now, you sure as hell doesn't want him to find you! If something like that happens, you're going to be squished like a bug!

Suddenly...as if to remember he's still the one who owns your fate, a grunt comes from above.
1113222.title: You continue...to shrink! Smaller than someone&...

choices: Intrigued by your form, he leans closer
11132221.content:
A grunt of discomfort is enough to warn you about the danger you've found yourself in, however, the situation you're in causes an uncomfortable state of panic. What are you going to do now? You're tiny! If this isn't a dream or some weird hallucination, then you're actually...tiny! What if there's no way to return back to normal? What if you're stuck like this forever? How will you continue your life? You can barely open a door anymore, let alone lead a normal life! If you didn't live alone, then you'd be in another problem: You'd have to explain this whole situation to your family, who'd take weeks to find your small body. IF they ever found you. What if you're confused with a bug and placed outside by your arthropod-friendly father (Despite your mother's insistent whining about crushing them). How would you survive in the outside world, with animals several times your body? Besides that, you'd have to search for a source of food and water, which would prove impossible, considering a glass of water is already bigger than you.

If you had paid a little more attention (Nobody can blame you, though, you're still adapting to your situation), you'd notice that Leon had already waken up. Not only that, but his eyes were squarely settled on your puny body, his vision still blurry from his sleep (And space-time teleportation).
11132221.title: He's waking up!

111322211.content:
Whether he ignores his new surrounding or is completely unaware that it's a stranger's house, it seems the redheaded is way more focused on the bug right in front of the couch. It moves to one direction, before returning to it's original position, almost like a person losing their mind. He furrows his eyebrows and his face fills with disdain and disgust. Instead of inspecting you, eventually leading to a contact between beings from different realms, the teenager couldn't comprehend the possibility of the bug being an actual human, but neither can you. Still lost in confusion, you wonder around in circles, trying to find a solution to your curse, almost forgetting a giant and handsome man slept behind you. Without much thought about taking a specific step, he raises his sneaker from the wooden floor, casting a shadow bellow his shoe. He aims at your puny body, unaware that he's not only taking out a human's life, but that he seems a merciless titan to him. It's the shadow that finally alerts you of your doomed fate. You completely stop walking and look up, only to see a dirty sneaker's sole hang above. "H-Huh...w-wait...!" However, before you can finish your sentence, the deadly shoe comes down with impossible rapid speed.

It doesn't take long before the sole touches your body, and in the following seconds, it begins to crush your body under it. Your leg's bones give in instantly, a pain that last only one or two seconds before more bones continue breaking. You open your mouth to yell, but you have no time to shout worlds of pain before you're finally crushed under the titan. His foot makes contact with the floor, leaving your body completely broken and smashed between them. He makes sure to wipe your existence by pivoting his shoe against the wooden floor, more and more bones cracking under the pressure. After a while, you're only a bloody pulp on the ground, but he can't feel it. Despite the fact you're still dead, he seems to still be filled with disgust, as his blue-hued eyes stare at his shoe. "Eww...gross."
111322211.title: He lifts his sneaker

1113222111.content:
You died, you're certain of that. The pain of having your body being literally crushed under a giant's clothed foot still lingers in your body. However, if the pain is real, then you're not supposed to have a body to begin with! It was crushed into nothingness, so the pain should have already stopped. Although, it is decreasing, you can still feel it. And then...you open your eyes. That's right, you're awake. The first thing you notice is the material you stand on. A wooden coffee table with your console on it. Well...you're still tiny, but at least you're alive, right? And, if you're on the coffee stand...then...

You shoot your hand backwards, and instantly notice the gigantic baseball player, a little confused by his situation. "Yo...where is this place? I was sure I was sleeping in class..." He scratches the back of his neck, barely caring about the danger of being kidnapped. Instead, he seems to just be confused. How chill could he be? "This isn't Kanon's house....so where the hell am I? Wait...Could this be...a girl's house?! Score!" He yells loudly, forcing you to cover your ears. This was going to be hard...
1113222111.title: You're dead...right?

choices: whoops, I forgot about Alter Ego
111333.title: More choices

1113333.content: Okay sense Alter Ego is a computer AI you can do whatever you want with him & he'll completely trust you no matter what you do Just keep in mind that if you do stuff like tickling him you'll need to create a version of jack that can interact with Alter Ego.
1113333.title: whoops, I forgot about Alter Ego

choices: Can my AI tickle you, Alter Ego?
11133331.content:
You can only look in suspicion at the laptop laying on your coffee table but what's even weirder is the note on top of it which reeds as fallows: What is on this laptop will grant your every desire, Your welcome.- From Anonymous

You raise an eyebrow at this as you start up the laptop & your immediately thrown for a loop as it clicks in your head that the laptop in front of you belongs to Chihiro Fujisaki which also means what's on this computer could only be Alter Ego which makes you happy on the inside your brought back to reality by a voice saying "Hello Master, I am known as Alter Ego. What is your name master?" You quickly type a response on the keyboard in front of you Afterword Alter Ego responds "Well then master Jack if you have anything you want to do go ahead and type it here." He says moving his eyes over to the chat box below him, You type a request for him: Could you create an AI version of me? He responds, "I'll make a perfect replica of you master."

After he says this the screen flashes for a second before you notice another figure appears next to Alter Ego & to your shock it's a perfect recreation of you! Same white hair, blue eyes, clothes even the same personality! You congratulate him on his superb work to which he responds "Stop it master! your making me blush." He states with a blush on his face. you give him a small smile as you type your next request which was...

(Credit for this chapter goes to Midnightwolf for his AI details)
11133331.title: Create your jack! (Reserved for Midnightwolf)

111333311.content:
Alter Ego went wide eyed at your request. Your AI was quick to act with a rather devious grin on his face. Alter Ego didn't even have a chance to respond before bouts of giggles poured from him. Your AI was endulging in his obviously sensitive sides. Though he refused to stop there. Moments later a rip was heard and Alter Ego's shirt was on the floor. Mere shreds of fabric now. Your AI looked almost devilish. Alter looked quite worried.

"Master where am I to be tickled?" Alter asked respectfully. You licked your lips in delight.

"Everywhere. And I mean everywhere. But what's your most ticklish? That's where the AI will start." You state reasonably.
111333311.title: Can my AI tickle you, Alter Ego?

choices: "Can my AI start going for your belly?" (navel included in the tickling)
"Can my AI start tickling your feet now?"
"I see a bump at your crotch can I investigate?"
1113333112.content:
"I think 1 of my most ticklish spots would have to be my armpits master Jack. I don't know where else I might be ticklish though never took the time to figure it out." Alter explains with a sheepish grin in embarrassment.

"That's all right Alter we can learn as we go." Without another word your AI begins to go to town on Alter leaving him a giggling mess. After about 20 minutes you decide to give Alter a break & let him breathe.

"Thank *huff* you *huff for this opportunity to have so much fun with you master Jack! I never knew I could get to have fun while pleasing my master at the same time." Alter says giving you a beaming smile, you smile back at him as you type up your welcome to him.

A few seconds later however you notice something making a tent in Alter's crotch. You now must decide what to type...

choices: Explore that bump. I'm curious how big you made me

Alter ego grinned widely at your request. Before he even answered, your AI is pinned down, shirtless and shoeless. You couldn't help but blush seeing the situation. You attempt to send a message, but Alter Ego beats you to it.

"Where first master? I'd love a shot at his feet. Maybe his sides. Though I can feel a bump under me. Can I explore that master?" He ask rather impatiently. You grin at the options.

"Give him a full work over. But start at....."

choices: You have a raging hard on in your pants!
Your cell phone is going off.

"...His feet start there & work your way around but save that bump under yourself for last. Think of it as a little surprise." You command as Alter begins to scribble his fingers all over your AI's feet sending him into a giggling fit.

"Thank you so much for this opportunity to please you master Jack! I want to make you very happy." Alter says grinning from ear to ear. You grin as well your AI's tickling continues for another 2 minutes until Alter suddenly stops & asks "master Jack what is that?" pointing at something not on the screen.

You look where he is pointing and find...

Finally you make up your mind. You wanted to get right to the sweet stuff. And you ain't meaning cake. With a small grin, you finally give the order.

"Yank away those pants and underwear. I think you know the rest." You command and watch. Alter blusges deeply understanding what you mean. But he gets to work regardless. "Why'd you keep his socks on?" You ask him curiously as he begins tickling the boys balls with vigor.

11133331331.content:
Alter blushed deeply at your request but nods never the less as he says "Very well, Master Jack I shall strip for you. But may I ask something Master?" You nod and raise an eyebrow as you ask "Sure Alter. What's up?" Alter still blushing brightly asks "How far must I strip Master?" You scratch your chin in thought as you say "Hmm, How about you strip down to your birthday suit?"

Alter then blushes deeper then before as he says "Understood, Master Jack. I shall do as you command." With that Alter goes about taking off his clothes one by one until he's standing in front of you naked as the day he was born, you blush a bit as you take in the form of your friend. From his pretty face to his slender frame as well as his flat tummy & his innie navel, as well as his legs and nice looking feet & toes.

"Ya know Alter, if it wasn't for that 'package' between your legs I might have accidentally mistook you for a woman." You say to which Alter giggles and says "Is that so Master?" You nod and say "Yep. Now let's see What can I do with you now?" You ask as you scratch your chin in thought. Alter then says..
11133331331.title: Naked as a new born baby

11133332.content:
On the couch, you see a glowing laptop, you almost immediately see that it contains Alter Ego. He's currently asleep though. You get a closer look and tap a couple of buttons, waking him up.

"Whoa whoa, just what do you think you're doing? Who are you?" He asks, confused. You get startled for a moment, but then introduce yourself. You then tell him where he, or technically the laptop, is. He nods. "Okay, I trust you. It was probably an interdimesional portal that brought me here. I have lots of information about it. Do you want to hear about it?" He asks.

"No thanks. However, I want to know how you can hear me." You say.

"Well, this specific laptop has a working microphone so it's not that hard. Anyway, now that we know each other, I would like to mention that I can be of service to you. Just watch." Ego suddenly creates a digital version that looks like you in the laptop. "This way, we can interact with each other in other ways besides talking. I have made it so that he controls like a video game character.

You see if he is correct and start hitting the letters w, a, s, d. The copy does start moving in a weird way.

"If that is too hard, just type in what you want to do, it's very intelligent."

"This seems like a lot to be able to do for an A.I." You say.

"I'm highly advanced, what do you expect? Whatever, how about you test it out." Ego says. You decide to try it by . . .
11133332.title: The smart A.I.

111333321.content:
Alter Ego doesn't even get a chance to react as you move your A.I version quick enough to pin him under your A.I's weight. "What's going on?" Alter Ego asks you sounding worried. You chuckle a little as you say "Hey Ego I'm wondering something.." You trail off as Alter Ego raises an eyebrow in confusion "What would that be, Master?" He asks as you continue.

"I wonder do AI's like yourself ever experience ticklishness?" You ask chuckling as a look of realization crosses your A.I friend's face, "That's a very good question.." He says trailing off as he gets a thoughtful look on his face. "Why's that?" You ask as Alter Ego continues "Because I don't even know if I'm ticklish to begin with! But I know how we can find out.."

"That so?" you ask curious wanting to hear what your friend had planed, "Yes and my plan is.."

(Choice 1: Full body examination: Alter Ego has you make your A.I tickle him all over to see if he's ticklish!)

(Choice 2: Reader's choice/ Something else)
111333321.title: Making discoveries of the A.I kind

choices: Make my A.I. look like something else
1113333211.content:
"Try to tickle me all over, and don't hold back." Ego says. You control your character and start to tickle his belly. He starts to giggle a little, but not much. You continue to tickle him in different places. When you get to his feet, he starts laughing really hard. His laugh isn't normal, it's actually quite scary to hear. You can hear a mix of different voices laughing, some children voices and some adult ones.

"It's probably just because he's an A.I." You say to yourself. You keep tickling him until the screen starts to fizz out. Not only that, but Ego looks like he's becoming corrupted, his arm looks like it's turning into simple data. The screen starts fizzing so much, you can't see Ego anymore. "Huh? Hey Ego, something is wrong! The screen . . It's . . " you say. Ego keeps laughing with that terrifying laugh, until he slowly gets control of himself.

"Huh? Oh I see, I'll try and fix it, hold on." he says in a strange voice. You start to hear noises, until the screen goes back to normal. "There we go. Sorry about that. I think it was because I was laughing since I'm connected to the programming. My laugh seems to damage the system. I'll start working on an upgrade for it." He says in his normal voice. His body looks completely fine as well. You smile.

"At least you're alright."

"Sir, you're too kind to me. Please tell me what you want me to do next. I am quite curious to see what your human mind comes up with." You think about what to have him do to your A.I. Then you come up with a interesting idea.

"Ego, I want you to . . .
1113333211.title: Computers weren't meant to laugh

choices: Let her wake up when she's ready
1121.content:
Your first thought is "Why has a cosplayer broken into my house just to go to sleep on the couch?". That's a pretty convincing cosplay of Kyoko though, so you move to get a closer look.

You feel creepy as you quietly check her hair to see if it's a wig, which it isn't, then find her purse and open it up. You pull out what looks like a shoddy tablet PC and turn it on, watching as it lights up with the name Kyoko Kirigiri before moving to a menu. Yep, this is an eHandbook from Hope's Peak all right. Would a cosplayer really go through that much effort? Could this really be her?

You then have a brilliant idea! You could wake her up and ask her who the fuck she is! Hm, she seems to be sleeping pretty soundly though. Whether she was a cosplayer that got high and wandered into someone's house or the real Kyoko zapped through from another dimension, she probably needed sleep. Still watching her sleep like this was giving you flagpole-related issues, so maybe it was best to wake her.
1121.title: Kyoko Kirigiri

choices: Gets up and leaves out the door!
1122.content: You can't believe your eyes as exactly whose seated on your couch "Holy smokes you...." You shuddered as the purple haired girl looks over at you with a sly smirk "Yeah I know who I am buster Toko Fukawa question is who are you buster brown and more importantly where am I?" You barely answer "In my living room." The girl in her slender school uniform(you wonder how anyone can wear something like that when its 87 degrees outside and in the dead of summer of all seasons) arched a eyebrow "You call this a living room? You got more couches and chairs here than any type of entertainment systems I ever seen." As she stared around in awe "But nonetheless I am impressed by my more...well 3-D surroundings but you mind explaining how on earth I could have gotten here?" You shook your head "It's complicated Toko I really can't explain it..." "Can you at least try boy? It's ain't like I got anywhere to go or more important things to do..." Though her tone was annoying as heck to you you sat down opposite of her and began explaining the best way you could finally following a full hour Toko got up and began pacing around "So you say I'm from a fictional anime world that by all means doesn't exist and you expect me to believe a word of this?" "Well by all means you shouldn't even be here you're only a cartoon character well a anime Japanese character anyway but yeah that's the size of it you aren't real." Toko unsure whether to believe you or not
1122.title: Toko Fukawa

121.content: Super Dangan Ronpa 2: Goodbye Despair is filled with many Males (8 being the principal ones) and, thus, you must choose a which one is in your house!
121.title: Male

1212.content:
To your surprise, a familiar face seems to be resting on your couch. Not a relative, since you know your family isn't around your house today, and it isn't a friend, you hadn't invited anyone after all. Actually, it wasn't anyone from your world, not anyone you know in three dimensions, to be quite honest. It was someone you only knew in 2D. Someone you knew from a game, not from real life. It was none other than...Gundham Tanaka!

And it seems he was just...waking up? Yeah...his groggy voice and hand, raising to his head as if he had a bad head ache, were enough to alert you...he really was about to wake up!
1212.title: Gundham Tanaka

info.brief_description: Danganronpa characters come into your home & start living with you. Anything can happen!
info.description:
Okay here's my 2nd interactive. You could say that this is kinda like my 1st interactive. But,this time there's a twist. (DANGAN RONPA!) That's right the interactive center's around the Trigger happy havoc franchise!

Anyhow, on to the rules.

Rules: 1. No insulting other races or people!
2. Use CORRECT grammar, NO text slang!
3. Death is allowed but the character must be revived afterword!
4.Chapters must be at least a paragraph long, unless your picking a character or making a choice chapter,don't make the chapters short!
5. Make an actual plot. I want an actual story for this with detail!

(Okay time to add a new rule to this interactive!)

6. I want to see the main character and the danganronpa characters actually build a friendship that'll build into a relationship that leads into sex (be it with a male or otherwise)

Other then that anything is fair game, microscopic voyage story? Shrinking? Giant/Giantess? Everything you can think of is up for grabs just fallow the rules and you'll be fine Don't forget I'll help you if you have writer's block & lastly Have fun!

9/11/2018: Okay I hate to do this but I have to give a warning to an author that has been adding here, recently some of your adds have depicted the main character trying to have his way with a character for personal gain, and I don't approve of that in any way at all! But sense I'm trying to be nice I'll let it slide this time. However! if I see it again I will delete it no if's and's or buts!!

8/15/2019 update: I'm looking for additions to my interactives! I'll give gp as rewards for the adds, however I do have rules for this:

1. If you do a character choice chapter you'll get 100 gp
2. If you do a story chapter you'l get 500 or 1000+ gp depending on the chapter's length
3. Stick to the guidelines of the interactive you add to
4. Lastly DON't add choice chapters over and over if you think you'll get more gp for it! If someone does so they will only get 100 gp for the FIRST chapter because if they do that it's not fair to others that may want to add to one of the interactives!
